recipes.name: Tiramisu
steps: Prepare espresso coffee and let it cool.
Beat egg yolks with sugar until creamy, then mix in mascarpone cheese.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer them in a dish.
Spread the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers.
Repeat layers and finish with a dusting of cocoa powder.
Refrigerate for a few hours before serving.
